discussion: Under the context of Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) issued an extraordinary cavalcade of pollution rule rollback. Discuss on climate change. Limit your speak up to 100 words. Everytime you respond, respond with <name>:.

Agent0: Well, that EPA rollback ain't good. Climate change is real, I see the storms getting worse. I don't trust all the fancy talk from the city folks, but we gotta protect our land and air. Makes sense to find a middle ground, right? Less pollution helps everyone, and maybe we can slow down the crazy weather a bit. It's about common sense, not just tree-huggers versus big business.

Agent1: Well, I reckon the EPA fiddling around ain't the end of the world. This climate change talk... I take it with a grain of salt. God's in control, and the Earth's been through changes before. But we still gotta be good stewards of the land He gave us. If these rules ease up on businesses and help folks keep their jobs, I'm not against it. Common sense says we can't bankrupt ourselves chasing shadows.
